content: and leave sts on a holder step 6 working the back of your piece transfer 75 80 90 98 back sts from your holder onto your working needles with ws facing you re-attach ball of yarn and start working back exactly the same as for front see step 4 starting with row1 step 7 binding off for back neckline and knitting the shoulder straps this step is exactly as step 5 step 8 join shoulder seams join shoulder seams using the three-needle bind off when applying the three-needle bind off a third needle is introduced copyright 2018 nancy ricci all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced or used for resale without the written permission of the copyright holder page 6� of 6� also the rs of work must face each other when you work this bind off method for right shoulder 1 place each half of right shoulder stitches on separate needles and make sure the rs is facing each other this means that the ws is facing outward hold the two needles together 2 introduce a 3rd needle and knit 1 st from the front needle and 1 st from the back needle together 3 knit the next stitch from the front needle and back needle together 4 you should have two sts on your right hand needle now pull the 1st st over the second st on the right hand needle this is your 1st bind off 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 until all sts are bound off repeat for left shoulder weave in all ends and wash/block your piece important note on washing your bamboo piece it will grow at least 2 to 3 inches this growth has been calculated into the design enjoy copyright 2018 nancy ricci all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced or used for resale without the written permission of the copyright holder
